ModMetaData.name: Arachnae Swarm English
ModMetaData.author: Geel
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Gemini AI English Translation For [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3584635117]Arachnae Swarm[/url][/h1]
This mod provides a full English translation for the [b]Arachnae Swarm[/b] mod, generated and refined using Gemini AI.
[hr]
[h3]Contributions and Feedback[/h3] If you would like to help improve the translation or suggest changes, feel free to: [list] [*] [b]Contribute on GitHub:[/b] [url=https://github.com/prizrak1609/Arachnae-Swarm-English]Arachnae-Swarm-English[/url] [*] [b]Leave a Comment:[/b] Post your suggestions or feedback in the comments section below. [/list]
[h3]Reporting Missing Text[/h3] If you find any text that is still untranslated, please let me know in the comments.
To help me fix it quickly, please include: [list] [*] 1. A description of the untranslated text. [*] 2. Where or how to find it in-game (e.g., specific menus, item descriptions, or events). [/list]
[hr]
[quote][b]Note:[/b] If the original developer of Arachnae Swarm wishes for this translation to be removed, I will do so immediately upon request.[/quote]
